description: Try our easy to follow Mediterranean Lamb & Veg recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Salad,Seafood free,Blueberry,Gluten free,Lamb,Egg free,Sesame free,Summer,Soy free,Wheat free,Kale,Cauliflower
name: Mediterranean Lamb & Veg Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.5 continental cucumber, coarsely grated, squeezed to remove liquid
650g butternut pumpkin, peeled, cut into 1.5cm pieces
2 cloves garlic, thinly sliced (plus 1 garlic clove crushed)

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 200Â°C. Line 2 baking trays with baking paper. Combine oil, juice, herbs and garlic in a jug. Season. Place lamb in a shallow glass or ceramic dish. Pour over half the oil mixture. Set aside for 30 minutes to marinate.

Meanwhile, toss cauliflower with half remaining oil mixture. Season. Spread over a prepared tray and repeat with pumpkin and rest of oil mix on second tray. Bake for 25 minutes or until cauliflower tender and golden. Set aside. Cook pumpkin for further 5-10 minutes or until browned. Set aside.
Preheat a barbecue or chargrill pan over medium heat. Add lamb and cook for 3 minutes each side or until cooked to your liking. Set aside to rest.
For tzatziki, whisk yoghurt, oil, juice and garlic in a bowl. Add cucumber to mixture and stir.
Combine vegetables with kale, beans, parmesan and blueberries. Season and toss gently. Slice lamb and serve with tzatziki and vegetables.
